solution_line_template: Dave weighs {dave_weight} pounds and can bench press {dave_multiplier} times his body weight, so he can bench press {dave_weight}*{dave_multiplier} = <<{dave_weight}*{dave_multiplier}={dave_bench_press}>>{dave_bench_press} pounds

Craig can only bench press {craig_percent_num}% of Dave's {dave_bench_press} pounds, so Craig can bench press {craig_percent_decimal}*{dave_bench_press} = <<{craig_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{dave_bench_press}={craig_bench_press}>>{craig_bench_press} pounds

Craig bench presses {craig_bench_press} pounds and Mark does {mark_less_amount} pounds less than Craig, so Mark can only press {craig_bench_press}-{mark_less_amount} = <<{craig_bench_press}-{mark_less_amount}={mark_bench_press}>>{mark_bench_press} pounds
